subject: Basketball
Homosexuality
lead_paragraph: Since the former N.B.A. player disclosed that he is gay, he said he has been overwhelmed by the mostly positive responses, but he has also been disappointed with reactions from what he calls a “noisy minority.”
snippet: Since the former N.B.A. player disclosed that he is gay, he said he has been overwhelmed by the mostly positive responses, but he has also been disappointed with reactions from what he calls a “noisy minority.”
